task.name: Dr Jonathan Carlson And Dr Amanda Beasley

results.message: Check that the title element describes the document.
Duplicate id attribute value "header-search" found on the web page.
This text input element does not have a name available to an accessibility API. Valid names are: label element, title attribute, aria-label attribute, aria-labelledby attribute.

This form field should be labelled in some way. Use the label element (either with a "for" attribute or wrapped around the form field), or "title", "aria-label" or "aria-labelledby" attributes as appropriate.
Check that a change of context does not occur when this input field receives focus.
